channel.title: Stepping up as new king not visible to some
channel.description:
#### What happened? The King was killed and a new King had to be elected. I step up to be King together with 2 other guys and the usual question for roles comes.
I claim to be the Drunk and while the voting is going on they say I was lying because I didn't step up.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to show up for everyone as someone who stepped up. Did not happen. Got executed instead.
#### Steps to reproduce: Be the Drunk, step up as king when he dies.
#### Comments: Screenshot attached. https://i.imgur.com/FSGOnuI.jpg
I did post this screenshot while the game was in progress when they were about to execute me, I know it is cheating and it's banable. I am sorry for doing this. I was just frustrated with this bug and that I was about I died for no reason.
It had no info that they wouldn't know either way though cause my dead confirms I'm the Drunk. So if I get banned it's understandable but I hope you guys have mercy on me.
Hope you guys can fix this :slight_smile:
